message: I have released a very prliminary alpha-style technology preview version of texturepacker: http://pypi.python.org/pypi/texturepacker/
I have now created a web site using Tetxurepacker: http://texturejam.org.uk/
The plan is to allow for punters to create and apply recipes to make remix texture packs. For now it is just a host for 2 recipes I added via the admin interface …
